title: Skins unavalible
body: Hello, so im just wondering why alot of the skins like Exiled Morgana, Vandal Vladimir, Count Vladimir, Perseus Pantheon are unavalible, they have been unavalible for a long time, and i really want to get Exiled Morgana.?

replies.body: That would be because a lot of those skins were just put into the vault.  They'll be back at other times in the future.
They've become Legacy skins, meaning they'll only be available occasionally.
and put into huge sales because you guys have a fetish for our wallets and we are ok with it
so who's leg do i gotta hump to get deadly kennen??? Seriously though they should put a banner on the skin you can see before you purchase the character so you know you cant have it.

yeah, back in the end of november, riot made a bunch of skins into legacy skins.

here is the post, which has the full list if your interested.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/skins-still-vault-hours-being-stolen
